traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The elven warden has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put them to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elven warden makes three melee attacks: two with their longsword and one with their dagger. Or the warden makes two ranged attacks with their daggers.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 +2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 +2) slashing damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 +3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Parry
actions.desc: The elven warden adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the elven warden must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
